rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {S6001}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MTH3241}

description: Homogeneous Markov chains in finite and countable state space. Foster-Lyapunov criterion for recurrence and transience. Random walks in one and more dimensions. Polya theorem. Limit theorems: law of iterated logarithms, functional central limit theorem. Connections with the Brownian motion and the heat equation. Applications of random walks to finance and insurance.
